WRITING.TITLE: Players not playing second half
WRITING.TEXT: Dunno if this is the place to ask, but I've tried Google and got nothing back. For some reason my starting RB and WR get auto benched for the second half of all my matches. They are still number one on the depth chart but no matter what I do they won't play. I've looked into the auto subs and made sure they aren't just being subbed out. Anyone had this before and know how to fix it?
They don't seem to be, just strange that it's always the second half
Nah, sometimes I am but not all the time
At the minute they are 70/95. Going to switch it up and see what happens I think

WRITING.TITLE: Madden 07 'What if Miami signed Brees'
WRITING.TEXT: So I've dusted off my old Xbox 360 and got a copy of Madden 07 to do a 'What if' I signed Brees for Miami and cut Culpepper. I also redrafted the entire draft until I caught up with myself. The main changed for the draft were the Saints taking Cutler no Bush. Miami also took Whitner not Allen and the Bills took Allen as Whitner wasn't available. The other loose end I had to tie up was Culpepper. The most QB needy team seemed to be the Bills, so I signed him for them. I then went on to sim the season. Miami needed with a 7-9 record and Brees had a decent year but nothing special. The Super Bowl was the Seahawks against......the Bills. In that game not only did the Bills win, and not only did Culpepper get injured and come back in to win the game but Jason Allen got a pick 6. So Miami might not have gotten Brees but at least Buffalo didn't win the Super Bowl. That is the silver lining I can take from this #128514; #128514;
It definitely wasn't great, and hadn't been for a while tbf

Unless it #8217;s faulty there is a 2 day return back to voucher for unwanted items. Other option is to sell it back to them. If you choose to do that don #8217;t mention that you bought it from them as if they fail the item then you should be able to get a refund as it #8217;s faulty

Some stores ask for ID if you are selling fairly new release games as the local polices ask them to do so, and sometimes it #8217;s just to be sure that the membership is yours. It #8217;s like a spot check
I had my elite controller sent away the other day and it #8217;s come back like mew. Only cost #163;28 and I 10000% recommended them. Turn around isn #8217;t rapid but quick enough
I know. My left bumped just came off when using it a few months ago, genuinely not very heavy handed, but they stuck down the rubber that was coming up as well
I was always told #8216;Everyday is a sale #8217; when I worked there
16 is fine. I had a couple of 16 year olds when I managed a cex
Yeah they have the repair company sticker on there after they remove the warranty seal. So I #8217;m 99% sure that should be fine to trade back in
If you contact the support team they should be able to get it for you
It #8217;s dependent on the area. Some counties say 16 some say 18. I #8217;ve bought in phones from people under 18 before. So long as the have ID
I #8217;d say 2 days more than 48 hours. I can #8217;t imagine the store being that picky. I use to refund stuff after 48 hours if the customer wasn #8217;t being a dick about it

I #8217;ve never had an issue ordering online. If you order a really obscure DVD or something they only have 1 in stock of they might fail the order if the shop can #8217;t find it, but phones are I believe stock checked weekly. You also have 14 days to return it to any store if you don #8217;t want it and get a full refund

I don #8217;t think they will, and normally they will pay more than retail for them. E.g. PS5 is sold at #163;450, CeX will pay #163;500 and sell for #163;550. So you will be paying around #163;100 more for a #8216;second hand #8217; one

WRITING.TITLE: Loyalty discounts
WRITING.TEXT: Yo. I work in a mobile phone shop and just wondering if anyone else gets people asking for loyalty discounts and not understanding why they can #8217;t have something better for less money. I #8217;ve tried it in my local supermarket saying #8216;I #8217;ve been shopping hear years can #8217;t I get some money off #8217; and was met with very strange looks. I have at least 5 times a day people saying #8216;I #8217;ve been with this network for years, surely I should get at least 20% off #8217; It is just me or do the public these days want something for nothing

That #8217;s what I find some people as for and that #8217;s fine. Most of the high street networks are pretty much the same price give it take a couple of quid. I was trying to explain to someone today that #163;55 a month for 24 months was cheaper than #163;46 a month for 36 months and they still wanted the price dropping closer to #163;46 to #8216;match #8217; the deal
Take it back to your local store. They #8217;ll be able to refund it for you as the company should have insurance through Royal Mail
